Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Viva Palma Nova Aparthotel in Calvia (Palmanova), you'll be convenient to Palma Nova Beach and Golf Fantasia. This 4-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Pirates Adventure Show and Western Water Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 198 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make a splash in one of the 2 indoor and 2 outdoor swimming pools and enjoy other recreational amenities, which include a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, supervised childcare/activities, and an arcade/game room.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at one of the aparthotel's 2 restaurants. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at one of the aparthotel's 2 restaurants. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Golf Fantasia - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Pirates Adventure Show - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Western Water Park - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi

Mallorca Casino - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi

The preferred airport for Viva Palma Nova Aparthotel is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
